titleStmt.title: The unexpected choice a novel / by Monsieur Scarron ; rendred into English, with addition and advantage, by John Davies of Kidwelly.
Châtinient de l'avarice. English
titleStmt.author: Scarron, Monsieur, 1610-1660.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Beginning tightly bound and has faded print in the filmed copy. Beginning-p. 47 photographed from Yale University Library copy and inserted at the end.
